SEARCH
Module fi.tuni.swdesign.movienightplanner
Package fi.tuni.swdesign.movienightplanner.utilities

Class TMDbUtility

java.lang.Object
fi.tuni.swdesign.movienightplanner.utilities.TMDbUtility
public final class TMDbUtility extends Object
The Constants class provides a set of constant values, configurations, and utility methods for managing supported languages, streaming providers, and generating URLs for movie data from The Movie Database (TMDb) API. It includes predefined language pairs, streaming provider IDs, and methods to retrieve provider-related data and formatted URLs for popular, top-rated, and filtered movies. This class cannot be extended since it is declared as final.
Author:
Make, ChatGPT(Javadoc comments)

  • Method Details

    • getProviderIds

      private List<Integer> getProviderIds()
      Retrieves a list of streaming provider IDs by using reflection to access the static fields in the PROVIDERS class.
      Returns:
      a list of integers representing provider IDs

    • getProvidersString

      public String getProvidersString()
      Encodes the provider IDs into a URL-friendly string, where IDs are concatenated and separated by the '|' character.
      Returns:
      a URL-encoded string representing the provider IDs, or null if encoding fails

    • getFiltersInt

      public String getFiltersInt(List<Integer> list)
      Encodes a given list of provider IDs into a URL-friendly string, where IDs are concatenated and separated by the '|' character.
      Parameters:
      list - the list of provider IDs to encode
      Returns:
      a URL-encoded string representing the provider IDs, or null if encoding fails

    • getFiltersString

      public String getFiltersString(List<String> list)
      Encodes a given list of genres and languages into a URL-friendly string, where strings are concatenated and separated by the '|' character.
      Parameters:
      list - the list of genres or languages to encode
      Returns:
      a URL-encoded string representing the genres or languages, or null if encoding fails

    • getPopularMoviesUrl

      public String getPopularMoviesUrl(Integer page)
      Generates the URL for retrieving popular movies from TMDb, with the list of providers encoded as a URL parameter.
      Returns:
      a formatted URL string for popular movies

    • getTopRatedMoviesUrl

      public String getTopRatedMoviesUrl(Integer page)
      Generates the URL for retrieving top-rated movies from TMDb, sorted by vote average and including only providers supported by the app.
      Returns:
      a formatted URL string for top-rated movies

    • getSearchUrl

      public String getSearchUrl(String query)
      Generates the URL for searching movies on TMDb based on a query string.
      Parameters:
      query - The search query string
      Returns:
      A formatted URL string for searching movies

    • getGenresUrl

      public String getGenresUrl()
      Retrieves the URL for fetching movie genres from TMDb.
      Returns:
      the URL string for fetching movie genres

    • getImagesBaseUrl

      public String getImagesBaseUrl()
      Retrieves the URL for fetching images from TMDb.
      Returns:
      the URL string for fetching images

    • getFilteredUrl

      public String getFilteredUrl(Integer page, List<Integer> genreList, List<String> audioList, List<Integer> provList, String minRating)
      Generates a formatted URL for discovering movies from TMDb based on specified filtering criteria. The URL incorporates filters for genres, audio languages, streaming providers, and minimum rating.
      Parameters:
      genreList - A list of genre IDs to filter movies by.
      audioList - A list of audio language codes to filter movies by.
      provList - A list of streaming provider IDs to include in the filter.
      minRating - The minimum rating to include in the filter.
      Returns:
      A formatted URL string with the applied filters, ready for use in TMDb API requests.
